summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the provision of emergency severe winter shelter services; increasing an appropriation to the Fleets and Facilities Department for life-safety and other building system enhancements to enable the occupancy of vacant space in the western base of Seattle City Hall; increasing an appropriation to the Human Services Department; reducing a previous appropriation to the Fleets and Facilities Department; and amending the description of the Fleets and Facilities Department's 2005-2010 Capital Improvement Program's "Civic Center Plan - Key Tower, Park 90/5, and Other Capital Projects" project; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
